section: Exercise 4.16.2: Find the next permutation in lexicographic order.
instructions: For each permutation of {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7}, give the next largest permutation or indicate that the permutation is the last one in lexicographic order.
question:
(b)

(7, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1)
answer: This is the last permutation, so there is no next permutation.
